DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy , safety tolerability combination treatment ibrutinib MEDI4736 patient relapse refractory lymphoma .
DOC.brief_title: A Multi-Center Study Ibrutinib Combination With MEDI4736 Subjects With Relapsed Refractory Lymphomas
DOC.criteria: Pathologically document relapsed refractory diffuse large Bcell lymphoma ( DLBCL ) follicular lymphoma ( FL ) Measurable disease sit CT scan ( > 1.5 cm long dimension ) Adequate hematologic function : 1 . Absolute Neutrophil Count > 1500 cells/mm3 2 . Platelets > 50000 cells/mm3 3 . Hemoglobin > 8.0 g/dL Adequate hepatic renal function : 1 . AST ALT ≤2.5 x ULN 2 . Bilirubin ≤1.5 x ULN 3 . Estimated creatinine clearance ( CockcroftGault ) > 40 mL/min ECOG 0 1 Received prior therapy : ibrutinib , BTK inhibitor and/or antiPD1 , antiPDL1 , antiPDL2 , antiCD137 , CTLA4 antibody Requires treatment prophylaxis strong cytochrome P450 ( CYP ) 3A inhibitor Primary CNS lymphoma evidence CNS involvement lymphoma
